text: Yang Li-yin (born 10 January 1963) is a Taiwanese actress. She won the Golden Bell Award for Best Actress in 2006. Best known for her roles on television, Yang has also appeared in films and on stage. ==Selected filmography== *Taipei Story (1985) *The Puppetmaster (1993) *Island Etude (2007) *Rookies' Diary (2010–11) *Material Queen (2011) *Inborn Pair (2011–12) *Miss Rose (2012) *Lady Maid Maid (2012–13) *King Flower (2013) *Just You (2013) *Endless Nights in Aurora (2014) *Tie the Knot (2014) *Say Again Yes I Do (2014–15) *Love or Spend (2015–16) *The Love Song (2016) *Love By Design (2016) *Swimming Battle (2016) ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Taiwanese actresses Category:21st-century Taiwanese actresses Category:Taiwanese film actresses Category:Taiwanese stage actresses Category:Taiwanese television actresses
title: Yang Li-yin
